title: RONALD ISLEY - THIS SONG IS FOR YOU  (2013)
description:
I don't think I need to explain who this guy is, but he is the FAMOUS Ronald Isley of the Isley Brothers and you all know, if RONALD is singing it, THEN IT MUST BE GOOD.

Here is the latest from MR BIG as some refer to him as. A fantastic collection of songs for your listening pleasure and Ronald delivers at his best.

Here is a little history of Ronald's latest album and recording history for those who don't know...

Musical legend Ronald Isley has release his new studio album, This Song Is For You, for 2013. The album features 13 songs which showcase the unique sound that has kept Ronald Isley in the spotlight for over five decades. The first single, a slow jam about asking a beautiful woman to go on a first date, is titled "Dinner and a Movie.

The album also features guest appearances from today s R&B super stars KEM & Trey Songz.

Impressive as it is, This Song Is for You is just the latest chapter in Ronald Isley's stellar, remarkably resilient musical life, first as lead singer of the Isley Brothers and more recently as a solo performer. Recording hits in virtually every era of contemporary popular music, Isley has created an incredible body of work that encompasses countless immortal soul, R&B and rock 'n' roll classics, including "Shout," "Twist and Shout," "This Old Heart of Mine," "It's Your Thing," "That Lady," "Harvest for the World," "Fight the Power," "For The Love of You," "I Wanna Be With You" and "Don't Say Goodnight (It's Time For Love)." 

Please keep the music ALIVE by seeding as long as you can. Thank you


            ALBUM TRACKS

	  1. This Song Is For You
	  2. Dinner and a Movie	
	  3. My Favorite Thing (feat. KEM)	 
	  4. The Boss	
	  5. Bed Time	
	  6. Another Night	
	  7. Lay You Down Intro
	  8. Lay You Down (feat. Trey Songz)
	  9. Reunion	 
	  10. He Won't Ever Love You
	  11. Better or Worse 	12. Let's Be Alone 
	  13. Make Love To Your Soul
